General.Name: Tanyuan Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Tanyuan Technology Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells thermal conductivity graphite heat dissipation materials in China. The company offers single layer, composite, and multi-layer graphite films; ultra-thin micro heat pipe and VC vapor chamber; glass panel and ceramic cover plates; and graphite radiant ceiling panels. Its products are used in smartphones, tablet computers, notebook computers, wearable devices, automotive central controls, dashboards, industrial computers, heat exchangers, servers, coolers, heat dissipation components of electronic products, etc. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Changzhou, China.
